Created an attachment (id=21881)
Screen Cap of the Project Explorer

fixed the bug on 06/02/2005. The problem was being caused by 
WebServicesNavigatoContentProvider#editModelChanged event

I have resolved this problem apprpriately rather than commenting out the code
completely.  The problem was the web service synchronizer was doing a removal
and refresh when it was not supposed to be.  This was in turn causing the
offensive behaviour.  I have added the code and will release for the 0609 I build.
Changed Version field given new release numbering.
